tarifForMilitary.title: Military Rate
tarifForMilitary.desc: Our heartfelt thanks go to our military, whose courage enables us to keep doing what we do best: offering warm hospitality.
tarifForMilitary.cardDesc: We are sincerely grateful to our military for the opportunity to continue working.
tarifForMilitary.cardDescMobile: We are sincerely grateful to our military for the opportunity to continue working
details: Discount available for service members of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, National Guard, border guards, Security Service of Ukraine members, veterans, and participants of ATO/JFO
To receive the discount, a valid military ID or combatant certificate must be presented upon check-in
conditions: This rate applies for direct bookings via phone or at the reception, only for individual guests
Discount cannot be combined with other promotions or special offers and does not apply to extra beds in the room

businessTarifDay.title: Business Daytime Rate
businessTarifDay.desc: Looking for a short stopover for business or inspiration? Choose our business daytime rate with a 50% discount on accommodation and enjoy comfort, coziness, and convenience in the heart of Lviv.
businessTarifDay.cardDesc: A short stopover for business or inspiration? Choose our daily business rate with 50% off
details: Accommodation in Standard and Standard with Balcony rooms for up to 8 hours, between 06:00 and 18:00 on the same day
50% off the accommodation price from the basic rate
Breakfast not included in the accommodation cost
conditions: Available for direct bookings by phone or at the reception for individual guests only
This discount cannot be combined with other promotions or special offers and does not apply to extra beds in the room
This offer may not be available on holidays or during high occupancy periods

petFriendly.title: Travel with Your Pet
desc: Our package is designed to make sure your furry friend feels right at home.
We provide comfortable conditions for staying with pets, including special amenities and gifts for your four-legged companions.
petFriendly.cardDesc: Our package is designed to make your pet feel at home.
details: Your pet will be welcomed with a cozy bed, food and water bowls, and essential items in the room
A complimentary treat and toy for your pet from our partner
You can bring up to two pets with you in the room
Accommodation fee: 500 UAH per pet, per day
conditions: Accommodation is available for small dog breeds up to 10 kg
A valid veterinary passport with up-to-date vaccinations is required
This offer is available for direct bookings by phone or at the reception for individual guests only

photoSession.title: Photoshoot
desc: Looking for a stylish location for stunning photos? Eurohotel
invites you to enjoy a unique opportunity and capture your photos in an elegant setting.
photoSession.cardDesc: Looking for a stylish location for the best photos? Eurohotel invites you to take advantage of a unique opportunity
details: 3,000 UAH — photoshoot in a Suite Room, up to 3 hour
4,000 UAH — photoshoot in a Deluxe Suite Room, up to 3 hours
Included in the price: room for the photoshoot for up to 3 hours and access to the hotel lobby for additional photo opportunities
photoSession.contactDesc: *Photoshoots in the RUFF restaurant or on the terrace are available by special arrangement and will be tailored to your preferences
conditions: Advance booking required, at least 3 days before the photoshoot date
Payment is due at the time of booking confirmation
Cancellations made less than 24 hours in advance are non-refundable
For photoshoots lasting more than 3 hours, the full room rate is charged

newlyweds.title: A Gift for Newlyweds
desc: The perfect start to your life together! Indulge in a memorable retreat after your most special celebration.
Let the sweetest memories stay with you forever!
newlyweds.cardDesc: Your perfect start to your life together! Treat yourself to an unforgettable vacation after the most important day of celebration
details: Complimentary stay in a Junior Suite or Suite (subject to availability)
A special gift from the hotel—a bottle of sparkling wine and a sweet treat
Late check-out (provided a room is available on the departure day)
A future bonus—15% off your stay when celebrating your first anniversary at the hotel
conditions: Complimentary stay is available when hosting a wedding reception at RUFF restaurant
Room reservation must be confirmed at least 7 days before the wedding date
The 15% anniversary discount applies to a stay during the first wedding anniversary and is available only for direct bookings through the hotel
The discount cannot be combined with other promotions or special offers and does not apply to extra beds in the room

birthday.title: Birthday Celebrations
desc: Celebrate your special day in the cozy ambiance of Eurohotel!
We’ve got a special surprise to make your celebration even more memorable.
birthday.cardDesc: Celebrate your special day in the cozy atmosphere of Eurohotel!
details: 20% off the base rate for any room on your birthday
A special gift from the hotel for the birthday guest
conditions: The offer is valid only on your birthday
The discount cannot be combined with other promotions or special offers
Available for direct bookings via phone or at the reception desk only
